name: Startup Jobs Italia
description: This is a free, niche job board for the Italian startup community. It was inspired by a similar website in Norway that I used to land my first tech gig in 2019.
alt: Screenshot of the Startup Jobs Italia homepage.

name: Confex
description: A multipage website for one of Scandinavia's leading course providers. Based on UI mockups provided by the client, I led the frontend development of the site with support from two fullstack devs.

name: CTRL + CSS
description: When Covid hit Norway and we were placed into lockdown, I decided to spend 4 hours replicating my Macbook Air keyboard with pure HTML and CSS. Apple never offered me a job, but I did make a lot of new Twitter friends!
alt: Screenshot of a pink Macbook Air keyboard rendered entirely with CSS.

name: Tetris
description: This was my first attempt at building a JavaScript game, and to be honest, it was brutal. I ended up following a YouTube tutorial and reaching out to the Twitter Dev community for help. However, I did gain valuable experience writing game logic!
